participant_1.name: Emily

participant_1.background: i live in a house. i have a boyfriend. i don't drink soda. i like to take walks. i like to eat hamburgers and french fries.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: disciplined and straightforward, values honesty and has a strong sense of duty.
participant_2.background: my favourite food is shawarma. i am in the army. i live in canada. i did not graduate high school. my grandfather served in world war a.
